chapters.title: Prologue:  By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Pappil, p. 17—Bayrd's grandfather, or perhaps his great uncle. He felt betrayed when Bayrd's father left to become a butcher in the city instead of keeping the family trade, which appears to be masonry or possibly weapon-making. He tried to pass his trade on to Bayrd as well. See also Bayrd.
